revision.text: Possibly: A new geographical grammar : and complete gazetteer; upon an improved, enlarged, and scientific plan...By William Gordon, of the Mercantile Academy, and author of The universal accountant, &c. &c. &c. (Edinburgh : Printed for Martin, McDowall, and Company. Sold by the Booksellers in the principal towns of Great Britain, Anno 1789). http://library.st-andrews.ac.uk/record=b1942969~S1
